panels.description: Custom panel items, which can be an array of strings, an array of objects, or a multi-line display if it is a two-dimensional array
panels.description_zh: 自定义面板项,可以为字符串数组，也可以为对象数组，如果为二维数组，则为多行展示

close-on-click-action.description: Whether to close the menu after clicking on the option
close-on-click-action.description_zh: 点击选项后是否关闭菜单

close-on-click-modal.description: Click whether the mask is off

lazy-render.description: The content of the elastic layer is lazy to render, and the content is only rendered when the display is triggered
lazy-render.description_zh: 弹层内容懒渲染，触发展示时才渲染内容

safe-area-inset-bottom.description: Whether the pop-up panel sets the bottom safety distance (iPhone X type models)
safe-area-inset-bottom.description_zh: 弹出面板是否设置底部安全距离（iphone X 类型的机型）

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when you click on an option
events.params: 菜单选项或自定义面板一维数组 （item: 选项对象, index: 选项下标），自定义面板二维数组（item: 选项对象, rowIndex: 选项行下标, colIndex 选项列下标）

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up layer is opened

events.name: opened
events.description: Triggered at the end of the pop-up layer opening animation
events.description_zh: 弹出层打开动画结束时触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the pop-up layer is closed

events.name: closed
events.description: Triggered at the end of the pop-up layer off animation
events.description_zh: 弹出层关闭动画结束时触发

events.name: click-modal
events.description: Triggered when the mask is clicked

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked
